author: Adam Guillen Jr.
title: UFC Vegas 48 results: Biggest winners, loser for 'Walker vs Hill' last night - MMA Mania
description: UFC Vegas 48 results: It’s time to see who were the biggest winners (and loser) from last night’s “Walker vs Hill” event in Las Vegas,
content: UFC Vegas 48 went down last night (Sat., Feb. 19, 2022) from inside UFC Apex in Las Vegas, Nevada. Headlining the event was a Light Heavyweight showdown between Johnny Walker and Jamahal Hill, which … [+2233 chars]
